import React, { Fragment, useEffect } from 'react'; import Spinner from '../layout/Spinner'; import Repos from '../repos/Repos'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; const User = ({user, getUser, getUserRepos, loading, repos, match}) => { useEffect(() => { getUser(match.params.login); getUserRepos(match.params.login); }, []) const { name, avatar_url, location, bio, blog, company, login, html_url, followers, following, public_repos, public_gists, hireable } = user; if (loading) return return ( <> Back To Search Hireable: {' '} {hireable ? : }

{name}

Location: {location}

{bio &&

Bio

{bio}

 } Visit Github Profile
  • {login && Login: {login} }
  • {company && Company: {company} }
  • {blog && Website: {blog} }
Followers: {followers}
Folling: {following}
Public Repos: {public_repos}
Public Gists: {public_gists}
) } User.propTypes = { loading: PropTypes.bool, user: PropTypes.object.isRequired, repos: PropTypes.array.isRequired, getUser: PropTypes.func.isRequired, getUserRepos: PropTypes.func.isRequired, } export default User;
